summary: India Today is a prominent media outlet with various platforms including TV, magazines, and digital content. It covers a wide range of topics such as technology, entertainment, sports, and global news. The site also features special sections like podcasts, opinion columns, and interactive content. Additionally, it provides information on events, gaming, and useful links for readers.

Manus AI, developed by the Chinese company Monica, is an advanced AI agent that can perform a wide range of tasks autonomously. It has gained significant attention for its ability to act as a general-purpose AI, capable of handling complex tasks without supervision. Manus can create websites, plan trips, analyze stocks, and more, all from a single user prompt. It is currently available on an invitation-only basis and is expected to be open-sourced in the coming months.

Manus AI is designed to work independently, continuing its processing in the cloud even if the user disconnects. It can interact with various platforms, take screenshots, record browsing activity, and generate files. The AI agent also displays its workflow in real-time, allowing users to see the process of task execution. Additionally, Manus can personalize outputs based on user interactions over time.

Manus AI is currently available only as an invitation-only web preview. The company has not announced a public release date but has indicated that the model will be open-sourced in the coming months. Users can interact with Manus by providing prompts, and the AI will research, compile data, and generate structured outputs in real-time.

MANUS Meta is a company specializing in high-fidelity hand and finger tracking technology. They offer a range of products including Metagloves Pro, Quantum Metagloves, Quantum Bodypack, and more. These products are used in various industries such as entertainment, VR/XR, robotics, and life sciences. The company provides resources like a download center and knowledge base, and has integrations with various software and platforms. MANUS Meta also participates in several industry events and conferences.

Manus AI supports multiple languages, allowing users to interact and receive outputs in their preferred language. It can handle real-time data processing tasks, making it suitable for live data analysis and monitoring. Manus AI is a cloud-based service accessible through web browsers on various devices, including desktops, laptops, tablets, and smartphones, regardless of the operating system. It supports multimodal inputs, allowing it to process and generate various types of data, including text, images, and code. Manus AI can create content in various formats, such as generating textual reports, creating visual data representations, and writing executable code, depending on the task requirements.

Manus AI is an autonomous AI agent developed by the startup Monica, designed to perform multi-step tasks with minimal human input. It can plan, execute, and refine tasks independently, functioning as a digital assistant capable of making informed decisions. Manus AI operates through a structured agent loop, iteratively processing tasks in a step-by-step manner. It includes features like a Linux sandbox environment, shell and command-line execution, integrated web browser control, file system management, and deployment capabilities. However, it has limitations such as looping errors, over-reliance on existing models, and security risks. Manus AI was evaluated using the GAIA benchmark and performed significantly better than previous state-of-the-art models, including OpenAI’s Deep Research system. Access to Manus AI is currently limited to an invitation-only beta phase.

Manus is a general AI agent designed to bridge minds and actions, excelling at various tasks in work and life. It delivers results while users rest, showcasing its capabilities through real-world task replays and featured research in areas like travel, stock analysis, education, and more.
Manus integrates comprehensive travel information to create personalized itineraries and custom travel handbooks for trips, such as a trip to Japan in April.
Manus provides in-depth stock analysis with visually compelling dashboards, showcasing comprehensive insights into Tesla's market performance and financial outlook.
Manus develops engaging video presentations for middle school educators, clearly explaining the momentum theorem through accessible and educational content.
Manus generates clear, structured comparison tables highlighting key policy information with optimal recommendations for comparing insurance options.
Manus conducts comprehensive research across extensive networks to identify the most suitable suppliers for specific requirements, working exclusively in the user's best interest.
Manus conducted in-depth research on AI search products in the clothing industry, providing comprehensive product analysis and competitive positioning.
Manus expertly navigated the YC W25 database to identify all qualifying B2B companies, compiling this valuable information into a structured table.
Manus delivers actionable insights, detailed visualizations, and customized strategies designed to increase sales performance for online stores by analyzing sales data.

Manus showcases various tasks submitted by users, such as creating a table of the best books on media and linguistics in France, finding the largest real estate brokerages, researching the impact of fire control technologies, generating SEO-friendly blogs, and more.

Manus Spaces gallery features incredible Spaces created with Manus, including tasks like Japan LBO QUEST, Quantum Computing Learning Hub, Stock Pattern Matcher, Discover the Wonder of Physics, IBIT ETF Dashboard, Super Mario Minecraft Style, Room with Calm Pop Culture Vibe, and Zinc Oxide Growth on Nickel Foam.
Manus has achieved new state-of-the-art (SOTA) performance across all three difficulty levels in the GAIA benchmark for evaluating General AI Assistants on solving real-world problems.

Manus is a general AI agent that turns thoughts into actions, with additional information available on their website, including company details, feedback, media inquiries, privacy policy, and terms of service.
